title: Sean Spicer Handed Mid-Briefing Note Saying, “You Just Committed a Felony”?
subtitle: Reports about White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer's being given an ominous note in the middle of a press briefing originated in satire.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: An aide handed Sean Spicer a note that read “You just committed a felony" in the middle of a press briefing.
